pageProduct.name: OsteoEze Triple Action Glucosamine Sulfate + Chondroitin + MSM 120 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

OsteoEze Triple Action is a specially developed joint care formulation containing three actives glucosamine, chondroitin and MSM to help provide relief from joint pain and mild inflammation associated with osteoarthritis.

Warnings

If symptoms persist, consult your healthcare professional. Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

Common Uses

OsteoEze Active Triple Action may help to:

  • Reduce osteoarthritis joint pain and mild inflammation
  • Improve joint mobility, flexibility and function in osteoarthritis
  • Assist in the development and maintenance of cartilage

Ingredients

Glucosamine sulfate 375mg (from Glucosamine sulfate sodium chloride 471mg); Chondroitin sulfate sodium 300mg; Dimethyl sulfone (MSM) 375mg.

Directions

Take 2 tablets twice daily (4 tablets) or as professionally prescribed.
